Evidence

1,806 people were arrested in New York during the Republican Convention. It is now clear that the police were simply harassing people to limit their freedom of speech. Very exciting. I just discovered via a discussion on Golublog that CiteULike provides RSS feeds for a number of anthropology journals, including *The Journal of the Royal Anthropological Institute* and *History and Anthropology*.
